title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: Pristine white sand spans the inner and outer rings of the atoll, while a collection of tropical trees rises high overhead, their trunks leaning on one another for support.  Flecks of darker sand glimmer in the pale sand leading to the choppy water of a small inlet.  Randomly placed stepping stones of ivory create an erratic path leading along the atoll's edge.

Pristine white sand stretches from the inner ring and outer ring of the atoll, while a collection of tropical trees rises high overhead, their trunks leaning on one another for support.  Flecks of darker sand accent the edges leading back to the inlet.
